name: Hotel Guestinn Residency
overview:
Comfortable Accommodations: Hotel Guestinn Residency in Mumbai offers family rooms with private bathrooms and showers. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Convenient Facilities: Guests benefit from a 24-hour front desk, housekeeping service, room service, car hire, and a tour desk. Free on-site parking is provided.

Dining Options: A vegetarian breakfast is served daily.

Prime Location: Located 3 km from Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport, the hotel is near Phoenix Market City Mall (4 km) and Dadar Railway Station (7 km). Other attractions include Siddhi Vinayak Temple and High Street Phoenix Mall. Guests appreciate the convenient location.

location.address: lgc 4-1/1, indira nagar, near maharashtra weigh bridge, l.b.s marg, kurla (w), mumbai 400070, 400070 Mumbai, India
